actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to authorize deposition testimony by Senator William Proxmire and representation by the Senate Legal Counsel

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Senator William Proxmire in connection with his testimony in the case of Charles G. Rebozo v. The Washington Post Company. Authorizes the Senator to testify at a deposition in such case, except concerning matters determined privileged from disclosure.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize deposition testimony by Senator William Proxmire and representation by the Senate Legal Counsel
